title: API Documentation
subtitle: Complete reference for JBelt Doctor REST API endpoints

meta.title: API Documentation - JBelt Doctor
meta.description: Complete REST API documentation for JBelt Doctor CAD/PLM system with endpoints, examples, and response codes

overview.title: API Overview
overview.description: The JBelt Doctor REST API provides programmatic access to all system entities. All endpoints require JWT authentication and return JSON responses.

archives.title: Archives API
archives.description: Manage digital archives and file references

authors.title: Authors API
authors.description: Manage authors, team members, and user information

models.title: Models API
models.description: Manage CAD models, parts, assemblies, and drawings

sheets.title: Sheets API
sheets.description: Manage drawing sheets and format specifications

positions.title: Positions API
positions.description: Manage coordinate positions and spatial data

success.title: Success Responses
success.204: No Content - Request successful, no content returned

error.title: Error Responses
error.500: Internal Server Error - Server error occurred

navigation.adminDescription: Access the admin interface for managing entities
